description: This file contains a function to seed initial recipe and menu data into a database for a food recipe application. It defines sample recipes, associates images with them, creates a menu, and adds everything to the database session.

methods.name: _seed(db: Session)
methods.description: Internal function that populates the database with sample recipes and a menu if the database is empty.

methods.name: seed_data()
methods.description: Public function that initializes database seeding by calling the internal _seed function within a new database session.
